videoAccessibility.pause: Select this button to pause the video
videoAccessibility.play: Select this button to play the video
videoAccessibility.mute: Select this to mute the video
videoAccessibility.unmute: Select this to unmute the video
videoAccessibility.keyboardShortcuts:
Use Space or Enter to pause/play the video.

Use M to mute/unmute the video.

Use Up Arrow and Down Arrow to increase/decrease the volume.

Use C to show/hide the captions.

course.frontAriaLabel: Activate and navigate to the next element for more information. There will be a close button to close the next panel.
